summary:
A standalone version of far327\'s Exquisite Modern Outrageous - EMO HAIR mod. 
This will ensure that any hair you change will not show up on any NPCs if you happen to use an NPC hair replacer that uses Apachii Sky Hair resources.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000]far327 is no longer present on Nexus so I think that my mod will not evolve in the future except if I receive some requests from hair modders.[/color]

First, I\'m French and I\'m not bilingual, so, please be indulgent.
 

[size=5]Description[/size]

This mod is a standalone version of far327\'s Exquisite Modern Outrageous - EMO HAIR mod which is a hair recoloring project meant to act as a replacer to existing Apachii Sky hairs.
This will ensure that any hair you change will not show up on any NPCs if you happen to use an NPC hair replacer that uses Apachii Sky Hair resources.
So, you can have Apachii Sky Hair [color=#ff0000]AND[/color] EMO hair like picture 9, 10, 11.


[size=5]Installation[/size]

ApachiiSkyHair and Exquisite Modern Outrageous are [color=#ff0000]NOT REQUIRED[/color].

Just download and copy to the data folder.

[color=#00aa00]Alternatives colors are in the texture folder.[/color]


[size=5]Credits[/size]
 
far327 for his Exquisite Modern Outrageous mod.
apachii

[size=5]My other mods[/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/39847/]Karlitos Wizardry[/url]
author: Karlitos
